From: ' (USANYS)" <1

Cc: 
'itANYS)"   (USANYS)" 
Subject: Re: Question from HQ 
Date: Fri, 16 Aug 2019 23:46:53 +0000 
I'm not sure I understand the question. Does he mean Epstein's prison call(s) while detained? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 16, 2019, at 7:23 PM, (USANYS) < wrote: 
FYI- let us know how you'd like us to proceed. 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: " 
(OIG)" 
Date: August 16, 2019 at 7:17:54 PM EDT 
To: " 
(USANYS)" 
Subject: Question from 
HQ 
and M, 
>, 
(USANYS)" 
My HQ has the following question on the underlying case, can you please forward this to the prosecutors on the 
underlying case? Thank you. 
o 
In addition to BOP policies, did SDNY have requirements to memorialize Epstein's phone calls related to 
the underlying case? If so, were they followed? 
U.S. Department of Justice 
Office of the Inspector General 
New York Field Office 
EFTA00019321
